message.content:
Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with mixed fruit (banana, apple, strawberry) and a drizzle of maple syrup.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and fresh herbs. Dressing made from lemon juice, olive oil, and salt.
Dinner: Lentil soup with spinach and carrots. Serve with a side of whole grain bread.

Day 2:
Breakfast: Chia seed pudding with coconut milk, topped with mixed berries.
Lunch: Veggie stir-fry with tofu, bell peppers, broccoli, and onions in a gluten-free tamari sauce. Serve over brown rice.
Dinner: Baked sweet potato topped with black beans, avocado, and fresh cilantro.

Day 3:
Breakfast: Green smoothie made from spinach, pineapple, banana, and coconut water.
Lunch: Zucchini noodles with marinara sauce and grilled eggplant.
Dinner: Tofu scramble with bell peppers, onions, and turmeric served with a side of avocado and gluten-free toast.

Day 4:
Breakfast: Rice porridge with mixed fruit, walnuts, and cinnamon.
Lunch: Kale salad with chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, and balsamic vinaigrette.
Dinner: Lentil tacos with lettuce wraps, pico de gallo, and guacamole.

Day 5:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made from banana, blueberries, and almond milk topped with granola and sunflower seeds.
Lunch: Veggie wrap with spinach, avocado, cucumber, and hummus.
Dinner: Quinoa and vegetable stir-fry with sesame oil, ginger, and tamari sauce.

Day 6:
Breakfast: Banana bread made without nuts or dairy (replace honey with maple syrup).
Lunch: Lentil soup with spinach and carrots. Serve with a side of whole grain bread.
Dinner: Veggie burger with a side of sweet potato fries and salad.

Day 7:
Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with mixed bell peppers, onions, and turmeric served with avocado and gluten-free toast.
Lunch: Zucchini noodles with marinara sauce and grilled eggplant.
Dinner: Tofu scramble with bell peppers, onions, and turmeric served with a side of avocado and gluten-free toast.

Remember to stay hydrated and include snacks such as fresh fruits, vegetables, or unsweetened coconut yogurt if needed throughout the day
